Zinzy Waleson

I'm Zinzy, a person living and working in Amsterdam. This here is a quiet street of the Internet where I come to link and think. I'm a researcher and designer making tools for people at work, a facilitator making resonant queer spaces, and a humble linguist who enjoys the art of writing. This website is a vastly personal project.

Digital garden

I keep a casual collection of unfinished thoughts; random snippets on a myriad of topics. Soft stances, lived experiences, and critical notes on the things I hold dear. Currently, there are 98 notes in the garden. I‚Äôve set up my garden as a scavenger hunt, so there is no permanent archive.
